name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Calvin WASHINGTON, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Calvin WASHINGTON, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of August, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED limited to the issue of whether competency hearings respecting child witnesses should be conducted in the presence of the jury.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John W. Packel, L. Roy Zipris, Philadelphia, for Petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
680 A.2d 873
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Calvin WASHINGTON, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 7, 1996.
John W. Packel, L. Roy Zipris, Philadelphia, for Petitioner.
